item.title: Advanced Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Here is a new one

for(i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players; i++) {
^
Operator < cannot be applied to int.players[]

if(i != null) {
Incomparable types: int and

item.title: Advanced Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Fine… Here is the fixed code.

if (command.startsWith("xteletomeall") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ for(i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players; i++) { if(i != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Unable to teleport all players!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Advanced Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Im sure some of you are familiar with the ::xteletome where it teleports someone to you, now, I wanted to make a new command, but expand on this one. As in, ::xtelealltome and it teleports EVERYONE on the server to me…How would I do this? If you want the code for the ::xteletome, here it is.

	if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 2))
	{
		try{
		String otherPName = command.substring(10);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.teleportToX = absX;
			p.teleportToY = absY;
			p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
			p.updateRequired = true;
		//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them";
			p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
			}
			else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } 
		}
			catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); }
	}

Anyone help?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 07:39:51 PM[/size][hr]<>[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 07:48:35 PM[/size][hr]<>

Read full topic
